metadata.title: CVE-2020-1983 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A use after free vulnerability in ip_reass() in ip_input.c of libslirp 4.2.0 and prior releases allows crafted packets to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libslirp package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0-2ubuntu2').
slirp4netns package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1-1').
